ygData.subject: Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantulas, in his vhicle mode, flew off his tires as al lthe shots aimed at him impacted. He gathered his thought, and sent a batch of eight cluster missles

Date: Sun, 24 Dec 2000 14:20:23 EST
Subject: Battle
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 126
From: JP3884@...

    Tarantulas, in his vhicle mode, flew off his tires as al lthe shots aimed 
at him impacted. He gathered his thought, and sent a batch of eight cluster 
missles at EndBringer.

    Tankkor growled as he was pelted with blasts. He turned and sent his mian 
laser turret blast at Killfest.

    Nighteyes covered her head, and with a bleeding hand, began to unload on 
Greven.

    Aerostreak dove into Killfest, sending them both skidding across the 
forest floor. (Hope you dont take that as a mode, sorry if you do.)

    Akron pickes her target. She see's Darkmouse and Scather, (Well, dosent 
actually see Scather) and sends several Energon bolt blasts at them.

    Putnam spots Golden eyes, and takes off into the air. He extends his 
hands and manages to grab hold of her leg, and begins to drain some energy 
out of her.

    Odiphious takes his riffle out and fires at Drillbit, and then sends an 
energon bolt at him.

    Venus, armed with an energon pistol, fires at Dollen. She is stil lsore 
from a hit she took in the shoulder.

    Megatron turns to Megaton. "Come on, Megaton, Marine, Pheniox, Jackle, 
and Gremlin. Youre all coming with me to help out in the forest. Lets go."
    Megatron was finally going to strech his legs after beening cooped up in 
the ice cave for so long.
